books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the disappearance of a Swedish heiress 40 years earlier.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An English teacher travels back to 1958 by way of a time portal in a Maine diner. His assignment is to stop Lee Harvey Oswald.

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Alex Cross investigates when the president’s children are kidnapped, but the F.BI. and C.I.A. interfere.
books.name: KILL ALEX CROSS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Partners in a small law firm take on a big case after a fast-track burnout joins them.
books.name: THE LITIGATORS

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: In the second volume of the Millennium trilogy, a Swedish hacker becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO PLAYED WITH FIRE

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man and woman who have gone their separate ways return to their Southern town for the funeral of a friend.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by Dean Koontz
books.description: A 19th-century tycoon’s mansion turned into luxury apartments remains in the grip of evil forces.
books.name: 77 SHADOW STREET

books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: After his parents die in a car accident, a young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.
books.name: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: Sick of her ex-husband and his new wife, Leslie Petruso meets someone else who thinks he’s done with love.
books.name: HIDDEN SUMMIT

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: In the town of Sea Haven, an undercover agent insinuates himself into the life of an elusive woman with ties to the crime lord he’s determined to trap.
books.name: SPIRIT BOUND

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: After a disastrous vacation in Hawaii, Stephanie Plum becomes the target of an international killer.
books.name: EXPLOSIVE EIGHTEEN

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: The third volume of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by Patricia Cornwell
books.description: The chief medical examiner Kay Scarpetta investigates a string of killings linked to the murder of her former deputy.
books.name: RED MIST

books.author: by Tom Clancy with Mark Greaney
books.description: Jack Ryan Jr. must stop an emerging threat from a Pakistani general.
books.name: LOCKED ON
